page.title: 08THE POST OFFICE CLAWTON
page.content: {Clawton Post Office}has been a{Post {Office}for 20 years but there has always been a shop there.The Post Office is open 7 and a half hours a day.The{Post Office}has 40-50 customers and has about 10{parcels}and 5O{letters}a day. At Christmas there are about 150 letters. Most people come to the Post Office for general{groceries. Mr. and Mrs. Pearce who own the{Post {Office}know nearly everybody who comes to the{Post Office.}The people who they don't know are usually holiday makes. The{Post Office}has two collections a day. Sixty five people come to the{Post {Office}to collect their{pensions. The{Post Office}is the only shop in Clawton.
